name: Galactic Distancing
description:
Your spaceship has malfunctioned and you can only boost yourself randomly. Survive as long as you can!

Note: HTML version does not keep history of high score after closing. Controls

Mouse only controls. Spacebar/Enter keys may work during gameplay, but we did not design around them, so unexpected behavior may occur.


Credits Programming Blong Timmy Yang    |    Michael Yang    |    Spencer Khang Art and Music McKenzie Yang    |    Blong Timmy Yang Sound Effects Sha Yang

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/blongty/Meibossama
